summary: The diff implements most requirements successfully, including removal of user accounts (ProfileSetupModal, useUserProfile, account/order history pages), first-user-becomes-admin authentication, homepage hero customization, social media URL management, removal of ShopDropdown, and pill-style category filters. However, Privacy Policy and Terms of Service updates are incomplete or missing critical content verification, and some acceptance criteria cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update Privacy Policy to remove all sections related to customer Internet Identity authentication and user account data storage
missing_requirements.reason: Privacy Policy still contains references that need verification. While the policy mentions 'Admin Authentication' with Internet Identity, it's unclear if all customer-facing Internet Identity and account storage references were removed as the original content is not visible in the diff

missing_requirements.requirement: Update Terms of Service to remove all account-related sections for customers
missing_requirements.reason: Terms of Service mentions guest checkout in section 6 but does not show comparison to original content. Cannot verify that all account creation, profile management, and login requirement references were removed

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module added to handle backend state migration from old actor structure to new structure
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested creation of a migration module. While this may be necessary for deployment, it was not part of the BuildRequest specifications

hallucinated_features.description: Removed Caffeine.ai attribution from footer based on project_state.json note
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specified to 'Keep newsletter signup form and storage in footer' but did not request removal of any existing attribution or branding elements
